word: Shortly before Christ's ascension, Philip said to Him, "Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us." Grieved at his unbelief, Christ turned to him, saying, "Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip?" Is it possible that I have walked with you, and talked with you, and fed you by miracles, and yet you have not comprehended that I was the Sent of God, "the way, the truth, and the life," that I came from heaven to represent the Father?
